data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Intertidal: spatially-nested biodiversity survey temperature data: Pico Creek, California, USA (IPICXX)

This metadata record describes a mix of intertidal seawater and air temperature data collected at Pico Creek, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using StowAway TidbiT Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. TBI32-05+37) beginning 2001-05-25. Temperature loggers are bolted down in a wire cage at one location within each site at Mean Sea Level (MSL). Temperature is recorded at 1 hour intervals.
